title: Dragonair offers special fares in celebration of senior citizens' dayTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Dragonair offers special fares in celebration of senior citizens’ day Published on : Friday, October 16, 2015
Dragonair is pleased to offer senior citizens in Hong Kong and Macau a special 25 per cent discount on tickets in all classes, and to a wide range of destinations, in celebration of Senior Citizens’ Day on 15 November.
This is the ninth consecutive year the airline has presented this special discount, with all citizens aged 65 or above able to use the discount to visit families and friends oversees or simply enjoy a getaway in their favourite destination.
Dragonair is offering these special discount fares as a way of expressing heartfelt thanks for the contribution senior citizens have made to the growth and development of Hong Kong.
The 2015 seniors’ promotion includes many of Dragonair’s popular regional destinations including Bali, Fukuoka, Penang and Taipei. Tickets must be issued between 19 October and 23 November 2015 for travel between 3 November 2015 and 20 March 2016. Blackout periods apply over the Christmas and Chinese New Terms and conditions apply for the special fares.
Source:- Dragonair
